    • Constructor Detail

      • Actor

        public Actor(int x,
             int y,
             processing.core.PImage sprite,
             int speed,
             Movement movement)
        Constructs Actor from given position, image, speed, movement
        Parameters:
        x - the initial horizontal pixel coordinate of Actor
        y - the initial vertical pixel coordinate of Actor
        sprite - the image used to present Actor
        speed - the speed at which Actor will move
        movement - the type of movement being implemented
